item.title: Bayesian Review
item.description: This notebook heavily inspired by 3Blue1Brown video on Binomial distributions | Probabilities of probabilities. This is my attempt to implement the code and gain deeper understanding on distribution. Imagine you are buying a new book in e-commerce, but there’s several sellers who sell that book. Because of your past trauma bought stuff online, you look at the seller’s reviews rating as your guide to choose where to buy.
